Simple Calculator is a powerful and user-friendly calculator extension that brings advanced mathematical capabilities right to your browser. Whether you're a student, professional, or anyone who needs quick calculations, Simple Calc is your go-to tool for all your mathematical needs.

Features:

Basic arithmetic operations: Addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division
Advanced functions: Square root, square, reciprocal, and percentage calculations
Editable calculation history: Review, copy, and edit your past calculations
Keyboard support: Use your keyboard for swift calculations
Clean, intuitive interface: Easy-to-use design for efficient calculations

How to Install:

Visit the Chrome Web Store and search for "Quick Calc" or use the direct link to our extension page.
Click the "Add to Chrome" button on the extension page.
A pop-up will appear asking for permissions. Click "Add extension" to proceed.
Once installed, you'll see the Quick Calc icon in your Chrome toolbar.

How to Use:

Click on the Quick Calc icon in your Chrome toolbar to open the calculator.
Perform calculations using either your mouse or keyboard:

Click the calculator buttons with your mouse
Or use your keyboard for input (numbers, operators, and Enter key for calculations)


For advanced functions:

'x²' calculates the square of a number
'√' calculates the square root
'¹/x' calculates the reciprocal
'%' converts the number to a percentage


View your calculation history:

Click the 'H' button to open the history panel
Use the 'Copy' button to copy any past calculation
Use the 'Edit' button to load a past calculation for modification


Edit mode:

When editing, use arrow keys to move the cursor
Use backspace to delete characters
Press Enter or '=' to perform the calculation


Clear your input with 'C' or 'CE' buttons

Tips:

Use keyboard shortcuts for faster calculations
The history feature is great for complex or repetitive calculations
Edit mode allows you to correct mistakes without starting over

Quick Calc is designed to be your reliable calculation companion, always just a click away in your browser. Whether you're balancing your budget, doing homework, or performing complex calculations at work, Quick Calc has got you covered!
Download Quick Calc now and experience the convenience of having an advanced calculator at your fingertips while browsing!
